name: Off-road Bike Stunt 3D
description:
Offroad Bike Stunts Racer is an exciting motorbike simulation game. Ride offroad and perform dangerous stunts as you are an amazing motorbike stunt rider. Get your bike to high speeds for more flips, high jumps and perform amazing bike stunts.

You are a racing stunt driver, show off your skills. Avoid obstacles and go to the extreme. Drive up ramps, fly high, do flips and impress and excite with your cool stunts. You are timed so be quick. You have been paid some handsome cash to show off your skills, gain more points and drive faster Use NOS for tricky stunts and higher obstacles. Land your bike safely on the rear wheel, landing on the front wheel, you will loose control, fall and will have to start again. The safer you land, the further you can go, the more you can show off.
